ability.name: Avoid logs
ability.technique_name: Indicator Removal on Host: Clear Command History

steps.command: pip install -q stormssh 2> /dev/null && storm list | sed 's/\x1b\[[0-9;]*m//g'
steps.plaintext_command: pip install -q stormssh 2> /dev/null && storm list | sed 's/\x1b\[[0-9;]*m//g'
steps.description: Search for valid SSH commands in the config file

steps.description: An adversary may want to discover which shell's are available so that they might switch to that shell to tailor their attacks to suit that shell. The following commands will discover what shells are available on the host.
steps.name: What shells are available
